changelog.change: Fixed autospliiter working incorrecly on N.Verted Levels.
Timer will unpause when the game is closed.
Fix for inconsistencies on load detection on some situations (Flashback Tapes).
Fix for the autosplitter incorrectly splitting time on some situations.
Updated Memory Pointers to remove external reference dependencies and increased precision on load detection [Thanks McCrodi].
Changed Memory Pointers for Game Patch 1 (1.1.04062021) [Thanks McCrodi].
Fixes for the Game Timer not resuming correctly when closing the game.
Fixed an issue with the Game Timer not working correctly when quitting to main Menu.
When the tool does not detect the Swirl on a specific number of frames during loading, time is added back to Game Time, and Game Timer is resumed.
Added a new Setting for Maximum number of frames to wait for the Blue Swirl before removing the load time.
Initial Release. Everything works very basically.
